byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Urges destroyer sale to Brit, Chicago Univ roundtable broadcast
snippet: CHICAGO, Sept. 1--The sale of destroyers to Great Britain would be equivalent to an outright declaration of war in the opinion of Senator Gerald P. Nye, who spoke today on the University of Chicago round-table broadcast....

headline.main: DESTROYER SALE ATTACKED BY NYE; Senator at Chicago Round Table Argues Aid to Britain Would Be Equivalent to War HIS VIEWS CHALLENGED C.M. Utley Advocates Help for England at Once to Back Our First Line of Defense

lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, Sept. 1--The sale of destroyers to Great Britain would be equivalent to an outright declaration of war in the opinion of Senator Gerald P. Nye, who spoke today on the University of Chicago round-table broadcast.
